ranklist.title: Tacticon BattleBeam V1 Laser Sight | Scope Rifle or Handgun | Weaver or Picatinny Rail | Red or Green Dot Lazer Sight Pistol | Tactical Sights Airsoft | | Pistol | Air Soft Optic (Green Laser)
contents: ✔ COMBAT VETERAN OWNED COMPANY! I stand by, create, and manufacture only the products that I use myself as a soldier.

✔ FAST MAGNETIC CHARGING & LIFETIME WARRANTY - We provide you with Also, if you don't like the product or if something happens to it please return it for a full refund or a new one! No questions asked!
✔ RIFLE, SHOTGUN, OR HANDGUN - This versatile laser sight can be mounted on any firearm with a picatinny or weaver rail.
✔ INCREDIBLE ACCURACY! You can adjust and zero-in this laser just like any other sight or optic. Simply use the elevation and windage wrenches included.

✔ HIGHLY VISIBLE & HIGHLY DURABLE - This laser is very powerful and can be seen with the naked eye at distances of up to 100 meters! It is made of a ultra-reinforced polymer that is both lightweight and will last a lifetime.

ranklist.title: Gmconn Mini Tactical Green Laser Sights Ultra Low Profile Green Dot Laser Gun Sight for Pistols, Fit Picatinny Rail, USB Rechargeable, Lightweight (Red Laser)
contents: ✅【ONLY ONE Screw + 21MM Width Rail】There are Three alternative screw holes on the Red laser sight, choose one for your preference and use the ONLY ONE SCREW to install the sight in a perfect location on your 21MM width standard rail with screw slot. Kindly be noted: If the clear space between the screw slot of rail and the trigger guard is at least 0.9 inch, it will fit.

✅【Class IIIA, <5mW】Bright and precision Red laser sight, Safe beam intensity/wavelength: <5mW peak, 532nm, Class IIIA. Highly visible red laser in any environments which can reach up to 50 to 100ft. during the day and up to 1000 ft. at night.

✅【User Friendly】Easy ambidextrous activation for left and right-handed users. The Laser sight is made of fiber-reinforced nylon material, which offers ultra compact and lightweight with Only 1.41oz (battery included).
✅【Rechargeable Battery】The Red Laser sight for pistol is powered by a built-in rechargeable battery, which is charged with an USB-C Cable. The red beam laser can be running to 5 hours.

✅【Powerful & Precise】The low profile red laser sight compatible with standard Picatinny rail which is designed for Pistols, Handguns, Glock, PX4,SIG and etc. Adjustable windage and elevation helps you be more accurate.

ranklist.title: EZshoot Red Dot Laser Sight Tactical 20mm Standard Picatinny Weaver Rail for Pistol Handgun Gun Rifle
contents: High-quality Material: Exquisitely crafted with premium aluminum alloy, sturdy and durable.
Portable to take:Compact, lightweight, durable.
Fit into most Gun:The Weaver Rail of Inlook Red Dot Laser Sight is Picatinny 20mm Standard size.
Higher Accuracy:Inlook Red Dot Laser Sight Adjust to windage and elevation for day & night shooting.it is anti-vibration,fog-proof and shock-resistant.
Contact Us: If you have any problem after you receive our product, please fell free to contact us, we will resolve it.

ranklist.title: Pinty Compact Tactical Red Laser Sight with Picatinny Mount Alan Wrenches for Hunting - Easy and Bright
contents: COMPACT FOR CLOSE QUARTERS: 32mm x 26mm x 26mm(1.2" x 1.0" x 1.0") Compact but powerful in function, it’s adjustable for windage and elevation.
ALUMINUM ALLOY CONSTRUCTION: Built with ultra-solid and lightweight T6061 aluminum alloy - the same material used in aerospace and sports car chassises. Finished in matte black.

DETACHABLE PICATINNY RAIL RISER: Mount your scope or tactical flashlight atop the laser, or remove the riser mount for a sleek, low-profile setup. The 1913 rail riser easily mounts on all your different Pic rail equipped guns, from shotguns to handguns, and everything in between.

EQUIPMENT FOR ALL: We make tactical gear for everyone from weekend hunting hobbyists to hardcore concealed carriers - even airsoft and paintball players love our specialized gun accessories for the tactical advantages they provide.
LASER WAVELENGTH: 650nm, power<1mw 100m

ranklist.title: Votatu H3L-G Green Laser Sight, Aluminum Ultra Low Profile Picatinny Mount Green Dot Sight, Strobe Mode Available, Magnetic USB Rechargeable and Ambidextrous Control
contents: Machined from high-strength aircraft aluminum and anodized with Mil-Spec finish. Stand up to recoil than most other laser gun sight.
IIIA Class Green Laser Power Output ≤5mw, features 520nm wavelength. Highly visible green laser reaches 200 meters during day and up to 2000 meters at night.
Ultra lightweight and compact. Super sleek and low profile design allows to fit in most holsters which is convenient for concealed carry.
Built-in magnetic USB rechargeable feature. Just stick the supplied USB charging cable to the charging port without any removing operation, easy and safe.
Ambidextrous control design, fits most standard, compact rail-equipped pistols,rifles and shotguns with modern (M1913 Pica tinny or Weaver-style) accessory rail.

ranklist.title: UUQ Mini Laser Sight Red Dot for Weaver or Picatinny Rail | Rifle Handgun | Red Dot Lazer Sight Pistol | Tactical Sights Airsoft | Scope Hand Gun Rifles | Laser Pointer Pistol | Air Soft Optic
contents: ✔COMPACT, SMALL SIZE, LOW PROFILE.(Laser Class: IIIR ; Max. Output Power : Under 5mW)

✔HIGHER ACCURACY：Windage and elevation are adjustable.The small adjustment hole on the top is for elevation adjustment(adjust up/down). The other one on the side is for windage adjustment (right/ left).

✔HIGH QUALITY：Solid aluminum alloy construction with black matte finish.The sight laser is not only durable, but also shockproof. If something happens to it, just send the product back to get the full refund or a new replacement.
✔EASY to INSTALL ：Comes with detachable rail mount, easily and conveniently mounted.This laser sight can be mounted on any firearm with standard 20mm Picatinny or Weaver rails.
✔PACKAGE INCLUDED : 1 x Red Laser Sight; 3 x Allen Key; 3 x Batteries

ranklist.title: Flashlight Laser Sight Combo,Compact Green Laser and Light Combo,Tactical Picatinny Rail Mounted Pistol Laser with Built-in Magnetic Charging Battery,Used for Pistols,Glock,Handguns,Shotguns,Rifles
contents: 1.【Compact and Robust Construction】-This Picatinny Laser sight for handguns is in Sleek and compact design looks great with all firearms and will easily accommodate most universal holsters. Built-in laser is emitted from the flashlight, which can greatly reduce the product volume, so as to have a better concealing effect.

2.【Four Running Modes Switch & Easy Operation】- Four running modes selector switch for Laser only, LED illumination only, both Laser and LED ,LED strobe. smaller size, more easier to put into your holster without any stuck. No matter using left hand or right hand,the laser sight can be conveniently operated.Turn on both of laser flashlight combo can work up to 90 minutes or so,just laser-5 hours or so,just flashlight-2 hours or so.

3.【Convenient Magnetic & Battery Charging】-Magnetic Charging allows you to charge the pistol laser sight combo without removing from your pistol,this will save your time and you do not need to calibrate the green laser for pistol next time.New magnetic charging system for maximum convenience,powered by all common USB power sources.Magnetic charging method is time saving and money saving.

4.【Adjustable Windage and Elevation】-Fully adjustable green laser allows you to adjust for both windage and elevation. with the provided tool ,you can adjust and zero-in this laser easily. Mini sized design makes this laser sight easy to suit most of the short and long sizes of pistols and rifles, you just need to put the screw bolt to the proper slot position and tighten it will be fine.

5.【Wide Compatibility】-This picatinny laser sight combo can be mounted to pistols including Modem Semi-automatic Pistols,full size of pistols,handguns,you can also use this laser sight for rifles and shotguns with any type of 21mm width of Picatinny Weaver Accessory Rail Mount.

ranklist.title: Votatu H3L-R Strobe Tactical Red Laser Sight, Aluminum Metal Construction Pistol Mount Ultra Low Profile Red Beam Laser Sight with Magnetic USB Charging, Ambidextrous Control
contents: Ultra lightweight and compact. Super sleek and low profile design allows to fit in most holsters which is convenient for concealed carry.
Machined from high-strength aircraft aluminum and anodized with Mil-Spec finish. Stand up to recoil than most other laser gun sight.

Strobe mode available, which can be instantly activated by simultaneously press the two switches. Ambidextrous control design. Fits most standard, compact rail-equipped pistols, rifles and shotguns with modern (M1913 Picatinny or Weaver-style) accessory rail.
Built-in magnetic USB rechargeable feature. Just stick the supplied USB charging cable to the charging port without any removing operation, easy and safe.
IIIA Class Red Laser Power Output ≤5mw, features 650nm wavelength. Highly visible blue laser reaches 50 meters during day and up to 1000 meters at night.

ranklist.title: ACTIONUNION Airsoft PEQ 15 Pro Green Laser PEQ Box IR Laser + Green Laser Sight + White LED Flashlight for AEG GBB CQB (Tan)
contents: PEQ 15 Pro – UHP visible green laser and IR laser are adjusted easily and freely through the box body screw fixed. An upgraded version of the IR glass lenses. Upgraded electric box and CREE XML lamp bead high order 5V~7.6 constant make photometric stronger.

Tactical Switch – Easy to control. Button & Remote Control Switch works with the selector switch. Includes five types for choice: LED flashlight / IR Laser/ Green laser sight / LED Flashlight + IR Laser/ LED Flashlight + Green laser sight.

Quality and Material – 100% Brand new. Made of high strength nylon plastic. Size: 12x7.3x3.7cm. Lightweight: Only 155g. Easy to carry. The adjustable airsoft laser sight can be moved up/down/left/right. Fits for standard 20 mm Picatinny rails.
Output Power – PEQ-15 Style. <0.7-1.0 mW Class II. Flashlight: around 270 lumens; High precision green dot laser integrated with bright LED flashlight.
Battery Type - Runs with 2pcs CR123A batteries or 2pcs 16340 / RCR123A 3V or 3.7V rechargeable batteries ( BATTERIES ARE NOT INCLUDED DUE TO AIRMAIL RESTRICTED ).

ranklist.title: Feyachi PL-31 Laser Sight Compact Shockproof Red Dot Laser Sight with Picatinny Rail for Pistol Handgun Shotgun Rifle
contents: Machined from High-strength aircraft aluminum body is hard anodized with a Mil-Spec finish for extreme durability. Shock proof,These red laser sights stand up to recoil better than other types of laser gun sights.
IIIA Class Power Output≤5mw red laser (650nm) for maximum visibility day or night. Ambidextrous On-Off switch. Ease of use, installed within minutes with a quick detach mount
Ultra lightweight and compact 2.4"L x 1.18W x 0.85"H. Weight: 1.57oz (Battery included). Super sleek design fits in holsters, great for concealed carry
The Feyachi PL-31 red laser sight fits most standard, full-sized, rail-equipped pistols, rifles and shotguns with Picatinny or Weaver rails
Compact, small size, low profile with easy operate on/off press-button switch.Includes 2 sets AG13 batteries （1 extra set of batteries ).

ranklist.title: Viridian C5L-R Universal Red Laser Sight and Tac Light for Sub-Compact Handgun Pistols, ECR Instant On Technology
contents: RED LASER: This compact red tactical laser sight utilizes a precise advanced 635nm wave length for the brightest, sharpest and visible red targeting dot. Class 3R Laser Product (Does not exceed Class IIIA emission limits), ≤ 5mW power output
RADIANCE TECHNOLOGY: 100 Lumens of bright light with horizontal light dispersion to better view threats across a wider area. Use the 140 Lumen strobe mode to disorient attackers.
EASY ACTIVATION: Easily activate the world's brightest red laser and/or the LED light when drawn. No fumbling with buttons in critical situations. When you draw, it's on!
UNIVERSAL MOUNTING SYSTEM: The modular rail set allows for quick mounting to virtually all railed handguns
BATTERY LIFE: 20+ hours in constant laser mode, 35+ hours in laser pulsing mode, or 75 minutes tac laser and light mode.
